Package org.apache.juneau.commons.io

package org.apache.juneau.commons.io
File and stream utilities, console support, MIME type detection, and path builders for working with files and I/O operations.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CharSequenceReader
    A Reader implementation that reads from any CharSequence (String, StringBuilder, StringBuffer, etc.).
    Console
    A utility for logging formatted messages to the console.
    FileReaderBuilder
    A fluent builder for creating Reader instances from files with configurable character encoding.
    FileWriterBuilder
    A fluent builder for creating Writer instances for writing to files with configurable options.
    LocalDir
    Represents a directory that can be located either on the classpath or in the file system.
    LocalFile
    Represents a file that can be located either on the classpath or in the file system.
    MimeTypeDetector
    A lightweight MIME type detector that doesn't require Jakarta Activation.
    MimeTypeDetector.Builder
    Builder class for creating MimeTypeDetector instances.
    NoCloseOutputStream
    A wrapper around an OutputStream that prevents the underlying stream from being closed.
    NoCloseWriter
    A wrapper around a Writer that prevents the underlying writer from being closed.
    PathReaderBuilder
    A fluent builder for creating Reader instances from Path objects with configurable character encoding.
    ReaderInputStream
    InputStream implementation that reads a character stream from a Reader and transforms it to a byte stream using a specified charset encoding.
    StringBuilderWriter
    A Writer implementation that writes to a StringBuilder instead of a StringBuffer.
